About Veronica

Born on February 19, Lagos state, Nigeria, Veronica Oluwatunmise, Adeusi is a First-class graduate of Accounting from Redeemerâ€™s University, Ede, Osun State in Nigeria and a Chartered Accountant in the Institute of Chartered Accountants of Nigeria (ICAN). She has harnessed cognate experience as a Credit and Financial Analyst and she currently works as a Financial Analyst in Lagos state of Nigeria.

She is passionate about helping teenagers and young adults identify their unique potentials and will remain committed to sharing her experiences using different platforms, one of which is through writing. She was one of the winners of the Tolutoludo book review in 2020 and her hobbies are to read wide and create beautiful contents.
